posts.title: Example Advice Post
posts.content: Please give me advice on this random topic. Please comment all of your advice down below.

posts.title: Example Question Post
posts.content: Please answer this random question. Please comment the answer down below.

posts.title: My head hurts!
posts.content: I have landed on my head attempting to do a backflip multiple times... What would you do?

posts.title: A second Question Post
posts.content: How can I do a backflip? I've been trying for years...

posts.title: My friend now hates my because I lied about knowing how to make pancakes
posts.content: I invited them to my house and told them I knew how to make pancakes. They hate me now. What would you do?

posts.title: How do you make pancakes?
posts.content: I invited someone to my house to make them pancakes. I was hoping they would know how to make them. Please help.
